description: Start your exploration of the Open House Soho Neighbourhood with a shot of coffee, a refreshing cold drink and a bite to eat.  Explore our newly installed timeline of Soho, and our existing display on the church's history.   Relax in our calm and welcoming gardens.  Starting point for the Creative Soho Walking Tours.

events.name: Drop in: Explore new timeline of Soho and exhibition
events.notes: A new timeline of Soho has been installed in Sacred Grounds in time for Open House Weekend.  Existing history info in the foyer.

factsheet.heading: Start your Soho Open House adventure here!
paragraphs: Designed by William Talman, clerk of works to Sir Christopher Wren, St Anneâ€™s was consecrated in 1686, destroyed in 1940, rebuilt in 1990 and enhanced with an award winning re-designed entrance in 2016.  The new community coffee shop has fast become a meeting space for the community of Soho.  Massive and delicious croissants and superb coffee.  View the brand new timeline of Soho installed for Open  House Weekend, as well as the existing history of the church.
Explore the historic gardens, relax on the terrace and plan your Soho Open House Neighbourhood adventure!

travel_info: Tube: Oxford Circus, Leicester Square, Tottenham Court Road

name: Sacred Grounds / St Anne's Church and Garden
